snippet: The organization pointed to a slowdown in Italy, China, Russia and India, as well as a decline in research and development spending outside of Asia.
abstract: Study by Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development points to a slowdown in Italy, China, India and Russia, with weak growth in France and Germany; sees slightly slower growth in Japan and the United States, while Britain and Brazil will slowly pickup in growth.
lead_paragraph: The organization pointed to a slowdown in Italy, China, Russia and India, as well as a decline in research and development spending outside of Asia.

headline.seo: O.E.C.D. Finds New Signs of Weakness in the Global Economy
headline.main: O.E.C.D. Finds New Signs of Weakness in World Economy
headline.print_headline: O.E.C.D. Finds New Signs of Weakness in World Economy
